Lynn.Rufus Choate House:
Rufus Choate (October 1, 1799 – July 13, 1859) was an American lawyer, orator, and Congressman.


== Early life and family ==
Rufus Choate was born in Ipswich, Massachusetts, the son of Miriam (Foster) and David Choate, a teacher and Revolutionary War veteran. He was a descendant of an English family which settled in Massachusetts in 1643.
